LanguageData.bloodsucking_spear_code.label: blood spear code
LanguageData.bloodsucking_spear_code.description: It is a cord needle containing the Blood Spear code that is inserted into the neck and enables the use of abilities for a certain period of time.\n\nThe code needle can only be used by vampire genes, and when used by ordinary humans, the ability is opened, but the use is disabled. Impossible.
LanguageData.blood_moon_Geis.label: blood moon code
LanguageData.blood_moon_Geis.description: The Bloodmoon code needle is inserted into the neck and sends a code to open the corresponding ability for a certain period of time.\n\nThis code needle can only be used by vampire genes, and when used by ordinary humans, the ability is opened but cannot be used.
